name: WP HiringThing
author: hiringthing.com

sections.description: HiringThing is online software that helps companies post jobs online, manage applicants and hire great employees. This plugin will embed the job listings from your HiringThing account in a widget. If you don’t yet have a HiringThing account, you can sign up for a free trial at http://www.hiringthing.com
sections.installation:
1. Unzip ‘hiringthing.zip’ in the ‘/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the HiringThing widget with your account URL.
  4. Place the new HiringThing widget in your layout as desired.
sections.faq:
How do I update my site when my HiringThing.com jobs change?

This HiringThing plugin will automatically update your website when you edit, remove or add jobs from your HiringThing.com account.

Do I have to have a HiringThing.com account?

Yes.

short_description: Embeds job listings from the HiringThing online recruiting service into your website.
